text: Barre Phillips (October 27, 1934 â€“ December 28, 2024) was an American jazz bassist. His career began in 1960. He was born in San Francisco, California. He performed mainly in Europe. In 2014, he founded the European Improvisation Center. Phillips died on December 28, 2024 in Las Cruces, New Mexico at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from San Francisco
title: Barre Phillips
